activities.title: Craft Workshop
activities.description: Creative arts and crafts session for children aged 5-12. All materials provided.

activities.title: Story Time
activities.description: Interactive storytelling session with engaging books and activities. Perfect for ages 3-8.

activities.title: Baking Fun
activities.description: Kids baking workshop where children can learn to make simple treats. Ages 6+.

activities.title: Half Term Games
activities.description: Fun games and activities session including board games, puzzles and group activities.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Fresh Ground is such a wonderful community space! The coffee is excellent and the atmosphere is so welcoming. My kids love coming here during half term activities.

testimonials.name: Michael Thompson
testimonials.text: Best coffee in Eltham! The staff are friendly, prices are reasonable, and it's a great place to meet friends. Highly recommend the cakes too!

testimonials.name: Emma Davies
testimonials.text: As a parent, I really appreciate how family-friendly Fresh Ground is. My children always feel welcome and the kids activities are fantastic. A real gem in our community!

testimonials.name: David Wilson
testimonials.text: Love supporting a caf√© that makes a difference. The coffee from Old Spike Roastery is delicious and knowing it supports a good cause makes it even better.

testimonials.name: Lisa Brown
testimonials.text: Fresh Ground has become my regular spot. Great coffee, friendly staff, and such a warm atmosphere. Perfect for catching up with friends or working quietly.

testimonials.name: James Miller
testimonials.text: The kids activities here are brilliant! My daughter had so much fun at the craft workshop. The staff are patient and creative, and the prices are very reasonable.
